mapper.select: SELECT P.PRO_NO, V.V_NO, P.PRO_NAME, P.PRO_PRICE, P.PRO_QUANTITY, P.PRO_BANNERIMG, P.PRO_WISH, P.PRO_SELLCOUNT, P.PRO_HIT, P.PRO_BIZNAME, P.PRO_DATE, M.M_EMAIL, M.M_NO, V.V_BIZNAME, V.V_LICENSE, M.M_NAME, M.M_ADDRESS1, M.M_ADDRESS2, M.M_ZIPCODE, M.M_EMAIL, M.M_PHONE FROM PRODUCT P INNER JOIN VENDOR V ON P.V_NO = V.V_NO INNER JOIN MEMBERS M ON V.M_NO = M.M_NO WHERE P.PRO_NO = #{PRO_NO}
select count(*) from ( SELECT P.PRO_NO, B.B_WRITER, B_DATE, B_CONTENT, B_EVAL FROM PRODUCT P INNER JOIN BOARD B ON P.PRO_NO = B.PRO_NO WHERE P.PRO_NO = #{PRO_NO})
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET PRO_QUANTITY = PRO_QUANTITY-#{O_QUANTITY}, PRO_SELLCOUNT=PRO_SELLCOUNT+#{O_QUANTITY} where pro_no=#{PRO_NO}
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.rv_img FROM ( SELECT b.*, row_number() over(order by b_date desc) as rnum, COUNT(*) OVER () AS total FROM board b WHERE pro_no = #{productNum} and b_c_no = 30) a left JOIN ( SELECT B_IMG_PATH as rv_img, b_no FROM board_imgs) b ON a.B_NO = b.B_NO WHERE a.rnum BETWEEN ${pageNum} * 10 - 9 and ${pageNum} * 10

SELECT z.pro_no, z.v_no, z.p_c_no, z.pro_price, z.pro_quantity, z.pro_bannerimg, z.pro_wish, z.pro_sellcount, z.pro_bizname, z.pro_name, z.avgeval, z.v_license, z.pro_hit, z.m_name, z.m_address1, z.m_address2, z.m_email, z.m_phone, z.countrv, i.pro_img_path, z.category1, z.category2 FROM ( SELECT a.pro_no, a.v_no, a.p_c_no, a.pro_price, a.pro_quantity, a.pro_bannerimg, a.pro_wish, a.pro_sellcount, a.pro_bizname, a.pro_name, a.avgEval, a.countrv, s.v_license, s.m_name, s.m_address1, s.m_address2, s.m_email, s.m_phone, SUBSTR(a.cate,1,INSTR(a.cate,'-') - 1) as category1, SUBSTR(a.cate,INSTR(a.cate,'-') + 1) as category2, a.pro_hit FROM ( SELECT p.*, nvl((SELECT AVG(b.b_eval) FROM board b WHERE b.b_c_no = 30 and b.pro_no = p.pro_no),0) AS avgEval, (SELECT COUNT(b.pro_no) FROM board b WHERE b.pro_no = p.pro_no) AS countrv, (select p_c_name from product_category t where t.p_c_no = p.p_c_no) as cate FROM product p WHERE p.pro_no = #{productNum} ) a INNER JOIN ( SELECT v.*, m.m_address1, m.m_address2, m.m_email, m.m_phone, m.m_name FROM vendor v INNER JOIN members m ON m.m_no = v.m_no ) s ON s.v_no = a.v_no ) z left JOIN ( SELECT pro_no, pro_img_path FROM product_imgs ORDER BY pro_img_path ) i ON z.pro_no = i.pro_no
mapper.update: update product set pro_quantity = 0, pro_bannerimg = '/images/utilities/non_exist_item.png', pro_wish=0, pro_sellcount=0, pro_hit=0 where pro_no = #{productNum}
